Verses: 1 pesdhu Enbavan Naattirku Adhibadhiyaaga Vandhu, Moondru Naalaanapinbu, Sesariyaavilirundhu Erusalemukkup Ponaan.
2 appozhudhu Piradhaana Aasaariyanum Yoodharil Mudhanmaiyaanavargalum Avanidaththil Vandhu, Pavulukku Virodhamaagap Piraadhupanni,
3 avanai Vazhiyile Kondrupodumpadi Sarppanaiyaana Yosanaiyullavargalaai, Thangalmel Dhayavuseydhu, Avanai Erusalemukku Azhaippikkavendumendru Vendikkondaargal.
4 adharkup Pesdhu Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Pavulaich Sesariyaavile Kaavalpanniyirukkiradhe; Naanum Seekkiramaaga Ange Pogiren.
5 aagaiyaal Ungalil Thiramullavargal Koodavandhu Andha Manushanidaththil Kutram Edhaagilum Undaanaal, Andhak Kutraththai Avanmel Saattattum Endraan.
6 avan Avargalidaththile Erakkuraiya Paththunaal Sanjariththu, Pinbu Sesariyaavukkup Poi, Marunaalile Niyaayaasanaththil Utkaarndhu, Pavulaik Konduvarumpadi Kattalaiyittaan.
7 avan Vandhabodhu, Erusalemilirundhuvandha Yoodhargal Avanaich Soozhndhunindru, Thangalaal Roobikkakkoodaadha Anega Kodiya Kutrangalai Avanmel Saattinaargal.
8 adharku Avan Uththaravaaga: Naan Yoodharudaiya Vedhappiramaanaththukkaagilum, Dhevaalayaththukkaagilum, Raayarukkaagilum Virodhamaaga Oru Kutramum Seyyavillaiyendru Sonnaan.

9 appozhudhu Pesdhu Yoodharukkuth Dhayavuseyya Manadhaai, Pavulai Nokki: Nee Erusalemukkup Poi, Avvidaththile Indhak Kaariyangalaikkuriththu Enakkumunbaaga Niyaayam Visaarikkappada Unakkuch Sammadhiyaa Endraan.

10 adharkup Pavul: Naan Raayarudaiya Niyaayaasanaththukku Munbaaga Nirkiren; Adharku Munbaaga Naan Niyaayam Visaarikkappadavendiyadhu; Yoodharukku Naan Aniyaayam Ondrum Seyyavillai, Adhai Neerum Nandraai Arindhirukkireer.

11 naan Aniyaayanjseydhu, Maranaththukkup Paaththiramaanadhu Edhaagilum Nadappiththadhundaanaal, Naan Saagaadhapadikku Manuketkamaatten. Ivargal Enmel Saattugira Kutrangal Mutrilum Abaththamaanaal, Avargalukkuth Dhayavupannumporuttu Oruvarum Ennai Avargalukku Oppukkodukkalaagaadhu. Raayarukku Abayamidugiren Endraan.
12 appozhudhu Pesdhu Than Aalosanaikkaararudane Aalosiththu: Nee Raayarukku Abayamittaaye; Raayaridaththirke Pogakkadavaayendru Uththaravusonnaan.
13 silanaal Sendrapinbu, Agirippaa Raajaavum Perneekkeyaalum Pesdhuvaik Kandukollumpadi Sesariyaavukku Vandhaargal.
14 avargal Ange Aneganaal Sanjariththirukkaiyil, Pesdhu Pavulin Sangadhiyai Raajaavukku Vivariththu: Peliks Kaavalil Vaiththuppona Oru Manushan Irukkiraan.
15 naan Erusalemil Irundhabodhu, Piradhaana Aasaariyargalum Yoodharudaiya Mooppargalum Avanaikkuriththu Ennidaththil Piraadhupanni, Avanukku Virodhamaagath Theerppuseyyavendumendru Kettukkondaargal.

16 avargalukku Naan Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Kutranjaattappatta Manushan Kutranjaattinavargalukku Mugamugamaai Nindru, Saattina Kutraththukkuth Thanakkaaga Edhiruththaravu Solla Avanukku Idankidaikkiradharkumunne, Kutranjaatti Avargal Patchamaai Avanai Maranaththirku Oppukkodukkiradhu Romarukku Vazhakkamalla Endren.
17 aagaiyaal Avargal Inge Koodivandhabodhu, Naan Evvalavum Thaamadhampannaamal, Marunaal Niyaayaasanaththil Amarndhu Andha Manushanaik Konduvarumpadi Kattalaiyitten.
18 appozhudhu Kutranjaattinavargal Vandhunindru, Naan Ninaiththirundha Kutrangalil Ondraiyum Avanmel Sumaththaamal,
19 thangaludaiya Maarkkaththaikkuriththum, Mariththuppona Yesu Ennum Oruvan Uyirodirukkiraanendru Pavul Saadhiththadhaikkuriththum Sila Tharkkavishayangalai Avan Peril Virodhamaaich Sonnaargal.
20 ippadippatta Tharkka Vishayangalaikkuriththu Enakkuch Sandhegamirundhapadiyinaal: Nee Erusalemukkup Poi, Ange Ivaigalaik Kuriththu Niyaayam Visaarikkappada Unakkuch Sammadhiyaa Endru Ketten.

21 adharkup Pavul, Thaan Raayarukku Munbaaga Niyaayam Visaarikkappadumpadikku Niruththivaikkappadavendumendru Abayamittabodhu, Naan Avanai Raayanidaththirku Anuppumalavum Kaavalpannumpadi Kattalaiyitten Endraan.
22 appozhudhu Agirippaa Pesdhuvai Nokki: Andha Manushan Sollugiradhai Naanum Ketka Manadhaayirukkiren Endraan. Adharku Avan Naalaikku Neer Ketkalaam Endraan.

23 marunaalile Agirippaavum Perneekkeyaalum Migundha Aadambaraththudane Vandhu Senaabadhigalodum Pattanaththuppiradhaana Manusharodunkooda Niyaayasthalaththil Piravesiththaargal. Udane Pesthuvinudaiya Kattalaiyinpadi Pavul Konduvarappattaan.

24 appozhudhu Pesdhu: Agirippaa Raajaave, Engalodekooda Ivvidaththil Vandhirukkiravargale, Neengal Kaangira Indha Manushanaikkuriththu Yoodhajanangalellaarum Erusalemilum Ivvidaththilum Ennai Varundhik Kettukkondu, Ivan Ini Uyirodirukkiradhu Thagaadhendru Sollik Kookkuralittaargal.
25 ivan Maranaththukkup Paaththiramaanadhondraiyum Seyyavillaiyendru Naan Arindhukondadhinaalum, Ivandhaane Raayanukku Abayamittapadiyinaalum, Avaridaththil Ivanai Anuppumpadi Theermaanampanninen.

26 ivanaikkuriththu Aandavanukku Ezhudhugiradharku Nichchayappatta Kaariyamondrum Enakku Vilangavillai. Kaavalpannappatta Oruvan Seydha Kutrangalai Eduththukkaattaamal Anuppugiradhu Buththiyeenamaana Kaariyamendru Enakkuth Thondrugirapadiyinaale,
27 ivanai Visaariththuk Kettapinbu Ezhudhaththakka Visesham Edhaagilum Enakku Vilangumpadi, Ivanai Ungalukku Munbaagavum, Viseshamaai Agirippaa Raajaave, Umakku Munbaagavum Konduvandhen Endraan.
